system.description: Instead of the standardized option, you requisition multiple racks of “hot” ammunition – same-bore slugs, with a higher grade of accelerant.
system.effect: Choose one weapon. 1/round, when you hit with an attack, you can cause it to deal +1d6 bonus damage.
system.mounted_effect: One weapon equipped to this mount deals +1d6 bonus damage 1/round on hit.
